articles.title: W.H.O.: aspartame could possibly cause cancer - CNN
articles.description: The World Health Organization warns that popular sweetener aspartame could possibly cause cancer.  Laila Harrak speaks with Dr. Thomas Galligan of the Center for Science in the Public Interest about the risks, and what consumers should do.

articles.author: Harriet Torry, Anthony DeBarros
articles.title: Economists Are Cutting Back Their Recession Expectations - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Forecasters still expect GDP to eventually contract, but later, and by less, than previously
